title: ICE: 'index out of bounds: the len is 0 but the index is 0'

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code Minimized code ```Rust pub fn encode_num(n: u32, mut writer: Writer) -> Result<(), Writer::Error> { if n > 15 { encode_num(n / 16, &mut writer)?; } Ok(()) } pub trait ExampleWriter { type Error; } impl<'a, T: ExampleWriter> ExampleWriter for &'a mut T { type Error = T::Error; } struct EmptyWriter; impl ExampleWriter for EmptyWriter { type Error = (); } fn main() { encode_num(69, &mut EmptyWriter).unwrap(); } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.61.0-nightly (8d60bf427 2022-03-19) binary: rustc commit-hash: 8d60bf427a4b055f464122062e76b3ec34d4f8ba commit-date: 2022-03-19 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.61.0-nightly LLVM version: 14.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'index out of bounds: the len is 0 but the index is 0', /cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/ena-0.14.0/src/snapshot_vec.rs:199:10 query stack during panic: #0 [codegen_fulfill_obligation] checking if `core::ops::try_trait::Try` fulfills its obligations #1 [resolve_instance] resolving instance ` as core::ops::try_trait::Try>::branch` #2 [collect_and_partition_mono_items] collect_and_partition_mono_items end of query stack ```
Backtrace

``` stack backtrace: 0: rust_begin_unwind at /rustc/8d60bf427a4b055f464122062e76b3ec34d4f8ba/library/std/src/panicking.rs:584:5 1: core::panicking::panic_fmt at /rustc/8d60bf427a4b055f464122062e76b3ec34d4f8ba/library/core/src/panicking.rs:143:14 2: core::panicking::panic_bounds_check at /rustc/8d60bf427a4b055f464122062e76b3ec34d4f8ba/library/core/src/panicking.rs:84:5 3: ::try_fold_with:: 4: ::fold_ty 5: ::select 6: ::enter::, rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>, rustc_trait_selection::traits::codegen::codegen_fulfill_obligation::{closure#0}> 7: rustc_trait_selection::traits::codegen::codegen_fulfill_obligation 8: >::with_task::), core::result::Result<&rustc_middle::traits::ImplSource<()>, rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>> 9: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query::), core::result::Result<&rustc_middle::traits::ImplSource<()>, rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>>> 10: ::codegen_fulfill_obligation 11: rustc_ty_utils::instance::inner_resolve_instance 12: rustc_ty_utils::instance::resolve_instance 13: >::with_task::)>, core::result::Result, rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>> 14: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query:: 15: ::resolve_instance 16:
